item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Politics, National, Vote 2020, Privacy
item.title: Disgraced National MP who leaked private Covid info resigns
item.description:
The MP who leaked private Covid data has resigned and won't stand in this year's election.
A statement from Clutha-Southland MP Hamish Walker says:
"Today I am announcing that I will not be standing ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
